name: mcp-bear
description: A MCP server for interacting with Bear note-taking software.

tools.name: open_note
tools.description: Open a note identified by its title or id and return its content.

tools.name: create
tools.description: Create a new note and return its unique identifier. Empty notes are not allowed.

tools.name: replace_note
tools.description: Replace the content of an existing note identified by its id.

tools.name: tags
tools.description: Return all the tags currently displayed in Bear’s sidebar.

tools.name: open_tag
tools.description: Show all the notes which have a selected tag in bear.

tools.name: trash
tools.description: Move a note to bear trash and select the Trash sidebar item.

tools.name: archive
tools.description: Move a note to bear archive and select the Archive sidebar item.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Show search results in Bear for all notes or for a specific tag.

tools.name: grab_url
tools.description: Create a new note with the content of a web page and return its unique identifier.
